title: Dental Technician
content:
To reinvent an industry, you have to build the best team. Join Formlabs if you want to bring ground-breaking professional 3D printers to the desktop of every healthcare provider, designer, engineer, researcher and artist in the world.
Formlabs is growing its Applications team to continue to push the boundaries of accessible desktop 3D printing. Our team engages in experimentation and collaboration to develop processes, tutorials, and white papers to inspire and inform Formlabs customers and the 3D printing community at large.
The dental industry is rapidly adopting 3D printing and other CAD CAM technologies. The Formlabs Dental Team is expanding to meet the high demands of the industry. We are looking for smart, detailed, and energetic people that get excited about helping to release cutting edge products. Join us as a Dental Technician!
The Job:

Produce, test, and validate dental applications

Print setting and material testing
Production of test parts held to the highest standards
3D scanning, file organization, data analysis, and logging
Manage sample part production for trade shows and marketing
Assist in testing requirements, goals, and features



Laboratory and production management

Manage dental prints for samples, assets, and testing
Maintain CAD, PreForm, and analysis files and structure
Quality control, inventory management, keeping space tidy



Data reporting

Report and communicate testing results
Maintain reporting and data so wider team can use information easily


Required Experience:

Natural understanding for computers
Excellent in verbal and written communication
Detail oriented person
Project management
Familiarity with CAD/CAM software
Basics of additive manufacturing

Bonus Experience:

A dental technician and/or CDT/RDT
Working knowledge of digital dentistry workflows
In-depth understanding of the dental industry
Experience with dental CAD software, like ExoCAD and 3Shape

Our Perks & Benefits:

Robust equity program to build future wealth through RSUs
Comprehensive healthcare coverage (Medical, Dental, Vision)
Low cost fund options in our 401K and access to advisors 
Generous paid Parental Leave (up to 16 weeks)
Tenure-based paid Sabbatical Leave (up to 6 weeks)
Flexible Out of Office Plan – Take time when you need it
Ample on-site parking & pre-tax commuter benefits
Healthy on-site lunches, snacks, beverages, & treats
Regular sponsored professional development opportunities
Many opt-in culture events across our diverse community
And of course… unlimited 3D prints

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company.  We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.  
Even if you don't check every box, but see yourself contributing, please apply.  Help us build an inclusive community that will change the face of 3D printing.
